thread.title: German passenger car sales up 5.0% in August, EV up 45.7%, PHV up 76.7%
thread.title_full: German passenger car sales up 5.0% in August, EV up 45.7%, PHV up 76.7%

author: MarkLines Co., Ltd.
title: German passenger car sales up 5.0% in August, EV up 45.7%, PHV up 76.7%
text:
German passenger car sales up 5.0% in August, EV up 45.7%, PHV up 76.7%
The number of August new passenger car registrations in Germany was 207,229 units, up 5.0% from the same month last year, and the total sales for the first eight months of 2025 were 1,874,820 units, down 1.7% from the same period last year, according to the figures released by the Germany Federal Motor Vehicle Office....
